name: Ore Lord
description:
You are the Noble Ore Lord who can summon any mineral to be your subjects, however, after the death of your brother, the Old Ore King, you are accused by the Ore General and exiled. You and your only remaining servant arrived in a desolate mining village, as there being whispered that an ancient artifact is buried beneath the village. Thinking that this may be the lost treasure of the Ore Kingdom, your servant descend into the collapsed cave and begin to dig deeper.

Dig deeper! Use the minerals you collected to summon minions and increase your teams' digging speed and survivability

Ore minions need a constant supply of minerals, or they would not maintain their form.

Craft equipment to distribute to your minions, so they can have further abilities

Ore General will constantly send armies from the surface to hunt you down, beware! 

Head into the unknown underground world and discover the legendary treasures!
